GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Battery, Charger, USB Cable, Head Set, Warranty Card

Warranty.Covered in Warranty: Warranty covers, repair of any part of product and if the defect is due to the faulty material or workmanship.
Warranty.Not Covered in Warranty: Any damage caused due to liquid enter in to the handset, misuse, accident or natural disasters, use of incompatible accessories or unauthorized software or if hand set is subjected to high voltage or cracks in device or display.
Warranty.Warranty Service Type: Contact Near by Celkon Authorized Service Center
Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty on the transceiver and 6months for the battery and accessories applicable with the warranty card
